changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE employee ( id UUID DEFAULT RANDOM_UUID() PRIMARY KEY, first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL, ssn INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );
